title: 544 28 "The Sun Pirates Split! Jimbei vs. Arlong!"Transliteration: "Kaizokudan Bunretsu - Jinbē tai Āron" (Japanese:海賊団分裂 ジンベエVSアーロン) Takahiro Imamura Jin Tanaka April 22, 2012(2012-04-22) April 24, 2022
transformers_text: 544 28 The Sun Pirates Split Jim bei vs Ar long Transliteration Kai z oku dan Bun re tsu J in b tai ron Japanese VS Takahiro Imamura J in Tanaka April 22 2012 2012 04 22 April 24 2022 Outraged after witnessing the death of Tiger Ar long returns to Foul shoot Island to kill the humans but Bor s ali no apprehends Ar long The humans take credit for Tiger's death to protect Tiger's reputation and pride Otohime meanwhile decides to continue her campaign for equality and freedom The World Government offers Jim bei to join the Seven Warlords of the Sea to promote peace for the island Hor dy however is dissatisfied with Jim bei's actions Jim bei has Ar long released from Impel Down Ar long reveals that he is a dog of the World Government and Jim bei fights him However he is unable to kill Ar long due to their time together Ar long and Jim bei go their separate ways to form their own crews
tf_idf_text: sun pirate split jim bei long transliteration kai oku dan bun tsu tai ron japanese takahiro imamura tanaka april april outrage witness death tiger long return foul shoot island kill human bor ali apprehends long human take credit tiger death protect tiger reputation pride otohime meanwhile decides continue campaign equality freedom world government offer jim bei join seven warlord sea promote peace island hor however dissatisfy jim beis action jim bei long release impel long reveals dog world government jim bei fight however unable kill long due time together long jim bei separate way form crew
